VeraDialogue2: ^I appreciate the help! You're a good sort.
^So, what was it you needed? A boat upgrade, right?
^Give me a sec and I'll hook you up.
^Are you heading out or is there anything else I could help you with?

g-0: ^I'm looking for my parents. Or at least, any trace of them... This was their boat.
^You wouldn't happen to know anything, would you?
^I thought I recognized that old thing.
^I'm sorry, kiddo, but I can't help you with that. I've no clue where your folks might've gone.
g-1: ^No problem! Let me know if there's anything else I could help you with.
